chapters.title: Chapter 37:  The Last Battle
chapters.info: Anla, p. 679—Elsbet's sister. She served as her advisor, and there is even a separate story that Thom is fond of telling that is all about her: “Anla the Wise Councilor.” Anla's name decorates the walls of the school in Rand's vision of the future, as presented by the Dark One. Thom Merrilin's name does as well. Editor's note: It has been speculated that Anla is Ann Landers, the councilor part coming from her popular advice column.
